clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of Kangfuxin and Basic Fibroblast Growth Factor in Promoting the Healing of Donor Site
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Prospective Clinical Study of Kangfuxin and Basic Fibroblast Growth Factor in Promoting the Healing of Donor Site

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to observe whether basic fibroblast growth factor and Kangfuxin Liquid can promote the wound healing in the donor area and further evaluate the healing quality.

primary_outcome.description: Means (wound area before treatment - wound area after treatment) / wound area before treatment × 100%.
Means time of complete wound healing

arm_group.description: Basic fibroblast growth factor,100ml/ bottle, (35000IU / 8ml) / 100cm2 / time,three times a day.
Kangfuxin Liquid,20ml / 100cm2 / time,three times a day.
0.9% Normal saline,20ml / 100cm2 / time,three times a day.
